concept.title: About formatting
concept.shortdesc: Why it is important to make your selections before the formatting.

conbody.p: You can apply a format (for example the font type) to the entire worksheet, or individual cells or areas of cells. The process is usually the same, but it depends on what is selected.
conbody.note: First select, then execute the format command.
conbody.p: You can select the entire worksheet through the button to the left of the first column and above the first row: Button for selection of all cells of the worksheet.
